Armor_T2.name: Armor (T2)
Armor_T2.blueprint_how: Can be bought, crafted in research station, etc...

Radpack.name: Radpack
Radpack.description: Used to safely carry isotopes on your person

Raider_Boots.name: Raider Boots
Raider_Boots.description: Increased damage to player built structures from sledgehammers, drills, and demolition charges. However, you take more damage from player built defences.
Raider_Boots.blueprint_how: Bought in the shop, before joining a game

Armor_Bench.name: Armor Bench
Armor_Bench.description: Can be used to craft advanced armor and protective gear.
Armor_Bench.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Base_Core.name: Base Core
Base_Core.description: A powerful computer which interfaces with the train and marks ownership territory.

Base_Core_Extender.name: Base Core Extender
Base_Core_Extender.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.description: Reload A calcium-polymer cell with high operational tolerance. Used to power a wide range of devices.
Battery.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Bedroll.name: Bedroll
Bedroll.description: An expanded polyurethane slab, covered in synthetic farbic. Used to set yout spawn point.

Breacher.name: Breacher
Breacher.description: Forces open the airlock into the next class, or into the engine. Attack into the airlock slot and give it time to work

Container.name: Container
Container.description: A polycarbonate storage chest. Room for 30 items.

Container_Lockable_T2.name: Container (Lockable - T2)
Container_Lockable_T2.description: A polycarbonate storage chest. 4-digit PIN with room for 60 items.

Cooking_station.name: Cooking station
Cooking_station.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Fashion_Machine.name: Fashion Machine
Fashion_Machine.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Incubator.name: Incubator
Incubator.description: An incubator for producing eggs. Takes a while to build!

Lamp_amber.name: Lamp (amber)
Lamp_amber.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Player Shop.name: Player Shop
Player Shop.description: Building - A place to sell yout items to other passengers
Player Shop.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Poisoned_Bandages_T1.name: Poisoned Bandages (T1)
Poisoned_Bandages_T1.description: These bandages look like regular bandages, but are infused with a contact poison. Be careful carrying these around!
Poisoned_Bandages_T1.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Poisoned_Bandages_T2.name: Poisoned Bandages (T2)

Poisoned_Bandages_T3.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Prop_Crafter.name: Prop Crafter
Prop_Crafter.description: Used to craft a wide range of props to decorate the train.

Radbox.name: Radbox
Radbox.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Recycler.name: Recycler
Recycler.description: Allows you to recycle items. Watch out! Takes up a lot of space.

Repair_Kit.name: Repair Kit
Repair_Kit.description: Has everything you need to fix almost everything

Resource_Relay.name: Resource Relay

Spray_Can.name: Spray Can
Spray_Can.blueprint_how: You get the blueprint whenever you register into class 2 or class 1.

Train_Information_Sign.name: Train Information Sign
Train_Information_Sign.description: A sign which displays useful information about events aboard the train.

Trespasser_Detector.name: Trespasser Detector
Trespasser_Detector.description: Use to detect presence of Trespassers

Weapon Bench.name: Weapon Bench
Weapon Bench.description: Can be used to craft advanced weapons and munitions.

Bedroll_2.name: Bedroll
Bedroll_2.description: An expanded polyurethane slab, covered in synthetic farbic. Used to set yout spawn point.

Container_2.name: Container
Container_2.description: A polycarbonate storage chest. Room for 30 items.

Crafting_Machine.name: Crafting Machine
Crafting_Machine.description: Can be used to craft a wide assortment of gear, tools, and base equipment.

Fuel_Core.name: Fuel Core
Fuel_Core.description: Fuel Core, the most valuable item in EngineFall. Explodes in 10 minutes after it is removed from the Fuel Core Generator

Fuel_Core_2.name: Fuel Core
Fuel_Core_2.description: Fuel Core, the most valuable item in EngineFall. Explodes in 10 minutes after it is removed from the Fuel Core Generator

Attachment_Flashlight.name: Attachment: Flashlight
Attachment_Flashlight.description: Can be attached to most pistols and SMG's

Attachment_Grip.name: Attachment: Grip
Attachment_Grip.description: -60% Weapon Spread -20% Equip Time -20% Unequip time

Attachment_Long_Barrel.name: Attachment: Long Barrel
Attachment_Long_Barrel.description: + 20% Damage + 50% Headshot Multiplier - 20% Vertical Recoil -40% Horizontal Recoil

Attachment_Stock.name: Attachment: Stock
Attachment_Stock.description: -10 % ADS Time -25% Reload Time + 0.05 Movement Speed

Low_Caliber_Ammo.name: Low Caliber Ammo
Low_Caliber_Ammo.description: 10 rounds of Low Caliber ammo, reloads Pistols & SMG's

Mining_Charge.name: Mining Charge
Mining_Charge.description: An explosive charge used to break up resource nodes. Used sparingly they can speed up resource harvesting. Triggered when they take damage from firearms or sledgehammers. WARNING: If a mining charge reduces a node to 0 HP, that node is destroyed and does not yeild any resources.
